entry.title: Guest blogging for NUS SoC blog
entry.summary: I'm guest blogging for the NUS SoC blog this week. Btw, I really enjoyed Bruce's postings on gaming, do check it out. On a related note, there is another interesting blog by an NUS SoC student at Life of a NUS Computing Student, some of the observations are rather funny â€¦
entry.content: I'm guest blogging for the NUS SoC blog this week. Btw, I really enjoyed Bruce's postings on gaming, do check it out. On a related note, there is another interesting blog by an NUS SoC student at Life of a NUS Computing Student, some of the observations are rather funny and insightful.
